Dear Dr. Goodwin,
is there a way to manage reduced mechanisms with Cantera?
for example, in
http://firebrand.me.berkeley.edu/griredu.html#sets 
a chemkin patch is proposed to manage steady state assumptions.
Thank you for your eccellent work.
Regards. Vincenzo.
